text: Sphenodesme thorelii Dop PDA (1915 [1914 publ. 1915]) Bull. Soc. Bot. France 61: 316. is the accepted nameThe Plant List: Sphenodesme thorelii Dop of a species of small liana in the genus Sphenodesme (family Lamiaceae). This species is named after the French botanist Clovis Thorel and found in southern Vietnam, where it may be called bội tinh Thorel. ==References== Phạm Hoàng Hộ (2003) Cây Cỏ Việt Nam: an Illustrated Flora of Vietnam vol. II (entry: 7402) publ. Nhà Xuẩt Bản Trẻ, HCMC, VN. ==External Links== * * * IPNI Id: 864673-1 * WCSP record: 194081 Category:Lamiaceae Category:Flora of Vietnam
title: Sphenodesme thorelii
